Text: hmm my avg pro got a positive also on the keygen.. don't know if it is false , but installing it on a new system so i am not going to take any chances... i had the serial for ages on a flashdrive...  register to "IcyCool" "2992A28687A90445B3E1CF4D067C127D179FB1B0E3C0" and use this code , works fine without the risk, once you install it , go to options and uncheck the update settings. thanx for the latest version of BS player , it rocks!!
